titleStmt.title: A true and certaine relation of a strange-birth which was borne at Stone-house in the parish of Plimmouth, the 20. of October. 1635. Together with the notes of a sermon, preached Octob. 23. 1635. in the church of Plimmouth, at the interring of the sayd birth. By Th. B. B.D. Pr. Pl.
titleStmt.author: Bedford, Thomas, d. 1653.

titleStmt.title: A true and certaine relation of a strange-birth which was borne at Stone-house in the parish of Plimmouth, the 20. of October. 1635. Together with the notes of a sermon, preached Octob. 23. 1635. in the church of Plimmouth, at the interring of the sayd birth. By Th. B. B.D. Pr. Pl.
titleStmt.author: Bedford, Thomas, d. 1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Anne Griffin, for William Russell in Plim mouth,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 1791a on UMI microfilm.
A variant of the edition printed for A. Bowler (STC 1791).
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
